TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Mahamadou_Issoufou, title = Mahamadou_Issoufou, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mahamadou_Issoufou} }

S.FORM: Mahamadou Issoufou ryax sa tay nqu tay, Mahamadou Issoufou, squliq na sezi'. (minhtuw sa kawas tay 1951) mrhuw Niger ta' misuw hya' ga Mahamadou Issoufou, aring ryax tay 7 squ byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2011 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru'

Mahamadoo Issoofoo ryax sa tay nqo tay, Mahamadoo Issoofoo, sqoliq na sezi'. (minhtow sa kawas tay 1951) mrhow Niger ta' misow hya' ga Mahamadoo Issoofoo, aring ryax tay 7 sqo byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2011 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro'
